title: Ticket #5789: Test for condor_q /condor_status/condor_history -pr <file>
description:
Needs a test for condor_q /condor_status/condor_history -pr <file>. Sample format files are found at:

ExperimentalCustomPrintFormats.

condor_q:

  • A test queue.cpf provided in the above link, which should print out the standard output for condor_q -nobatch

  • A test to output condor_q -tot

  • A test where in the format file several random attributes are selected and listed with certain length.

  • A test for keyword "WHERE".

  • A test to make sure width works correctly.

  • A test for keyword ifthenelse

  • A test to see if the default output changes accordingly by setting the config parameter. There are two options to add the following parameters to the config file:

    • 1) call condor_q -nobatch 
          Q_DEFAULT_PRINT_FORMAT_FILE=<format_file>
    Q_DEFAULT_<arg>_PRINT_FORMAT_FILE=<format_file>

    • 2) 
          CONDOR_Q_DASH_BATCH_IS_DEFAULT=false
    Q_DEFAULT_PRINT_FORMAT_FILE=<format_file>
    Q_DEFAULT_<arg>_PRINT_FORMAT_FILE=<format_file>

    • <arg> can be RUN, HOLD, GOODPUT, GLOBUS, GRID corresponding to the -run, -hold, etc arguments to condor_q

Note: when <arg> is a command that does not have a summary line, adding the above param would not output a summary line regardless of whether it is required in <format_file>. Related ticket: #5800
check_ins: 2016-Aug-01 14:00   Check-in [48915]: Added tests to test condor_q -pr <format_file>. Ticket #5789. (By shuyang )
creator: shuyang
